/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, symbols of the city's active lifestyle, are scattered throughout the scene, adding a dynamic element to the image. The street itself is lined with trees, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures and adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
